recipe.title: Big Boy Burgers
recipe.comment: Thanks to Sam, Liam and David for sharing your cooking skills in Cazzies kitchen!

part.title: Patties
part.step: Mix all ingredients together and make into 6-8 patties.
Cook on stove top until brown about 6-8 minutes.
Place in oven proof dish and cover with foil and place in preheated oven while you cook the other ingredients.

part.title: Extras
part.ingredient: 6 sour dough rolls halved and slightly toasted
1 piece of cooked bacon per roll
Few leaves of baby spinach per roll
part.step: Cook the bacon first and place in oven proof dish then pop in oven to keep warm.
You can place your cheese slices on top of your burgers while they are keeping them warm at this time.
While you fry your eggs, toast your rolls.
You can either make the burger or place all ingredients on the bench or table and let people decide what they would like in their burger.
You can substitute the rolls for a gluten free option if desired.
